articles.title: Ruth Mariam Ipe , PhD
articles.contents:
Ruth Mariam Ipe
          
          
          Home
          Education
          Publications
          Teaching
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Ruth Mariam Ipe
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            I am a researcher working on the synthesis of porphyrins.
            I am interested in the applications of porphyrins in
            optoelectronics and photodynamic therapy. I have experience
            working on pi-Extended Porphyrinoids and
            bis-Carbaporphyrinoids incorporating Polycyclic Aromatic
            Hydrocarbons (PAH’s) and its applications.
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Ruth Mariam Ipe
            
            
              
                
                                    
                    
                      LinkedIn
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      Email
                    
                  
                                  
              
            
            
              I am a researcher working on the synthesis of
              porphyrins. I am interested in the applications of
              porphyrins in optoelectronics and photodynamic therapy. I
              have experience working on pi-Extended Porphyrinoids and
              bis-Carbaporphyrinoids incorporating Polycyclic Aromatic
              Hydrocarbons (PAH’s) and its applications.

articles.title: Publications
articles.contents:
List of Publications
Ipe, R. M.; Nag, P.; Mori, S.; Nambiar, A. P.; Reddy, V. S.; Gokulnath, S. Synthesis, Structure and Optical Properties of a Bis-Macrocycle Derived from a Highly Emissive 1,3,6,8-Tetra(1H-pyrrole-2-yl)pyrene. J. Org. Chem. 2022, 87, 15022-15030.
Ipe, R. M.; Parammal, A.; Nag, P.; Mori, S.; Nambiar, A. P.; Reddy, V. S.; Gokulnath, S. Synthetic Model for FRET Constructed from Covalently Linked Porphyrin Dimers via Pyrene Bridge. J. Org. Chem. 2023, 88, 5780-5790.
Ipe, R. M.; Nambiar, A. P.; Nag, P.; Reddy, V. S.; Gokulnath, S. Unprecedented formation of bis-Calix[5]phyrins centrally linked with pyrene subunits. J.Porphyrins Phthalocyanines. 2023, 27, 1203-1211
Ipe, R. M.; Kamalini, S.; Sahla, N. C. P.; Gokulnath, S. 5,15-A2BC Type Donor Acceptor Porphyrin Systems Bearing Two Different Polycyclic Aromatic Hydrocarbons. Manuscript prepared.
Nambiar, A. P.; Nag, P.; Ipe, R. M.; Reddy, V. S.; Gokulnath, S. Conformationally Conformationally Locked Cyclo[2]Dipyrrins Linked with Anthracene Subunits: Synthesis and Chiroptical Properties. Angew. Chem. Int. Ed. 2023 e202306566. doi:10.1002/anie.202306566.
